title: Escape
lyrics:
Nan nega waenji budamseuleowoss-eo
Ne gyeot-eseo yeong-wonhal jasin eobs-eo
Chalali nal uisimhaejwo
Jigeusi nal balaboneun neol bomyeon
Eokkaega mugeowojyeo
Neon naege manh-eun geos-eul gidaehago balaneun deushae boyeo

Geuge nal michige haneun geonde

Neon moleuna bwa nae mamgwa saeng-gagdeul

Ganeumhal sujocha eobsna bwa



Jinaon chueogdeul-i

Naege byeoldaleun uimiga issjineun anh-a

Neol salanghan sigandeul-i

Geojis-ieossdaneun mal-eun anijiman



I don't know girl

Neol beos-eonago sip-eo yeah

I don't know but

Jeonbu da naelyeonohgo sip-eo



Nan tteonabeolil geoya neol deungjigo

Domangchyeobeolil geoya neol beoligo

Dwido jeoldaelo boji anhgo

Imma runaway Imma runaway

Imma runaway runaway baby



Yeoleo gajiga mugeobgo beogeowoss-eo

Naega deo mang-gajilkka bwa neol beoligo domangchyeo nan

Chaeg-imgam eobsgo igijeog geuge naya

Chisahago yong-gido eobs-eo geulaegeulae ne mal-i maj-a da

Nan neoui sangcheoboda nae hulyeonham-i meonjeoyeoseo

Jeomcha nega geol geochyeoseo yangsim ttawi da naeda beolyeoseo

Ne geogjeongbodan nae haengbog-i nun-e hwonhaeseo

Hanchi gomindo eobs-i mosnagil seontaeghaess-eo



I don't know girl

Neol beos-eonago sip-eo yeah

I don't know but

Jeonbu da naelyeonohgo sip-eo



I I I I was eager to escape

I I I I was eager to escape

I I I I was eager to escape

I I I I was eager to escape



Bigeobhago cham nadabji moshaessjiman

Nan nan neol nan neol beos-eonago sip-eoss-eo ye

Bigeobhago sangcheoleul naege jwossjiman

Ama neon ileon nal bomyeon nega tteonass-eul geoya



Nan tteonabeolil geoya neol deungjigo

Domangchyeobeolil geoya neol beoligo

Dwido jeoldaelo boji anhgo

Imma runaway Imma runaway

Imma runaway runaway baby



I I I I was eager to escape

I I I I was eager to escape

I I I I was eager to escape

I I I I was eager to escape
